Package org.jetlang.fibers

Interface Summary
Fiber Fibers provide event queueing, scheduling, and full pub/sub capabilities when combined with a Channel.
 

Class Summary
FiberStub Provides a deterministic fiber implementation for testing.
FiberStub.ScheduledEvent  
PoolFiberFactory Factory that creates Fiber instances that share threads.
ThreadFiber Fiber implementation backed by a dedicated thread for execution.
